changelog.description: Updates have been slow for the last few weeks due to a complete redesign of Keystone.guru. This process takes a long time as I'm revisiting just about everything the site has to offer and reworking it to some extent. You can view the ongoing progress of the redesign at https://github.com/Wotuu/keystone.guru/projects/4. Thank you for your patience so far!

changes.change: Sanguine Depths: Added a missing Venthyr Anima Cage in the beginning of the instance.
Various enemies are no longer marked as bolstering/sanguine/bursting.
Route thumbnails are once again being generated.
